server.dataBaseAccessClasses

Class ImageDAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • server.dataBaseAccessClasses.ImageDAO

  • public class ImageDAO
extends java.lang.Object
    Any part of the system that needs to access information about Images in the database will go through the ImageDAO class.
    Author:
    isai

      It edits and updates a row If it succeeds, it returns true.

      It gets all the rows in the table If it succeeds, it returns a Images object that contains several Image objects If it fails, it outputs FAILED
